description.en: Study of Machine Design by Example Units: Design Concepts & Methodology, Design Approaches (Material Selection, Element Design, Manufacturing Control and Integral Design), Quality and Design Function, Theoretical Study in Designed Examples.

description.zh: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。
description.en: Introduction to a variety of manufacturing processes and associated production equipments, operations planning and cost estimating of the production process, techniques of measurements and basic components of a quality control  system, concepts of process automation and computer integrated manufacturing.

description.en: This course aims to effectively promote students' capabilities of using English for engineering issues, particularly focused on the following: 1.To write his/her curriculum vitae and resume. 2.To read scientific/technical magazines and handbooks. 3.To present his/her work by English. 4.To write and edit presentation material(s) by English. 5.To construct and write a concise report by English.The coursed is also devised to include about one third of total teaching hours to practice English, particularly used in office or work, in the language laboratory.

The material in this course is arrange accordingly in four parts: (1) Fist-order, second-order and higher order differential equations. (2) Systems of differential equations. (3) Series solutions of differential equations and special function. (4) Laplace transforms.

description.en: This laboratory course is designated to acquaint the student with the experiment methods of practical instrument and apparatus. It contains the following topics: physical chemistry, polymerization techniques, analytical methods in environmental science, biochemical methods in fermentation, surface chemistry, emulsification techniques, electrochemistry, and organic syntheses.

description.zh: 本課程介紹利用質量、能量守恆定律(熱力學第一定律)及均衡方程式(熱力學第二定律)，並在導入逸壓（Fugacity）觀念下，討論單成份系相平衡問題。最後延伸至多成份系統的熱力學性質的探討。此外還介紹化工程序中真實流體流動熱力學、機械能均衡、熱力學機械之設計與作功原理、熱機循環之熱力函數及熱機效率。
description.en: This course is designed as an introductory course in thermodynamics of chemical engineering.  Topics include the first and second law of thermodynamics, open and closed system, thermodynamics properties of materials, generalied correlations with real fluids and multicomponent systems.  Emphasis is placed on the chemical potential and its use in phase equilibria and chemical reaction equilibria.

description.zh: 如何將材料創造出強度更高，延伸率，斷面收縮率，衝整值等耐強度更大之材料，除了調整合金元素外，如何應用熱處理之手段使材料達到所求之特性。對於各種熱處理之原理、解析及實際的應用作詳盡的介紹。隨著科技之發達，機械工業之進步、構造物之增大及精密化、迷你化之趨勢，金屬材料所要求之性質需要更進一步之強化，為滿足此一要求，除調整合金元素之外，必須賴適當的熱處理，才能發揮材料本身含有合金元素之功能，亦可滿足吾人所需之各種用途，本課程為使學生瞭解這些處理方法，由理論上說明熱處理與變態理論，及熱處理對強化機構上之理論根據，及熱處理之方法等，本熱處理課程內容有：1.金屬熱處理之基礎，各種組織與變態，平衡圖在熱處理上之應用，連續冷卻，恆溫冷卻，在熱處理之應用、鋼之淬火變態舉動，合金元素在材料上之影響，結晶粒之大小性質對熱處理之影響，鋼之硬化能之應用及計算方法。2.熱處理技術、鋼之加熱及各種熱處理方法。3.鋼之光輝熱處理，保護爐氣之種類及其管理方法。4.鋼之表面硬化熱處理。5.淬火零件之設計及材料之選擇。6.工具模具鋼、不銹鋼、鑄鐵、銅及鋁合金之熱處理。7.熱處理發生不良原因及其防止方法。

Pinpoint to the theory ,analysis,practical applicaton of all kinds of heat treatment,,it would be detailly introduced by this course.

description.zh: 本課程包含1.複合材料的基礎知識：如複合材質及複合過程，複合構造及組織、複合材料的力學性質等基本知識。2.各種複合材料的 介紹，如炭素纖維強化複合材料金屬等複合材料等，原理及應用之 介紹。3.對於尖端技術領域之應用。複合材料大致可區分為高分子 基複材，金屬基複材，陶瓷基複材及纖維複材四種。纖維複材中， 可依強度，韌性和成本需求而選用玻璃纖維、硼纖維、碳纖維、有 機纖維、陶瓷纖維、金屬纖維等作為強化元件。上述各種複材製造 方法，介面結構，機械性質，應用，微觀力學、巨觀力學、強度、 破裂、疲勞和設計均為討論內容。

The fiber composite material can be selected as reinforced parts according to strength, toughness and cost requirement, such as glassfiber, boronfiber, carbonfiber, organic fiber, ceramic fiber, metal fiber.The above-mentioned manufacturing method, interface structure, mechanical property, application, microdynamics, macrodynamics, strength, fracture, fatigue and design are all the c

description.zh: 本課程從電化學概念，電極電位，及腐蝕原理中建立學生腐蝕技術，包括DC極化法，AC阻抗法，諧波法，ER測試，ERR敏化測試高溫水溶液，應力腐蝕測試等，另外腐蝕壽命評估，材料腐蝕管理系統，核能電廠材料，地下緊密電位量測，水溶液腐蝕抑制效果，鋼筋混泥土結構防蝕效果評估均在本課程中一一介紹。
description.en: 1.Electrochemical mechanisms2.Corrosion tendency and Electrode Potentials3.Polarization and Corrosion Rates4.Theories of Passivity5.Corrosion Prevention6.Eight forms of Corrosion7.High Temprature Corrosion

description.zh: 本課程是設計給大學及研究所的理、工科學生作為研習管理的入門課程，內容大體上包括有管理的基本理論、管理資訊系統、破壞性技術對傳統挑戰的挑戰、科技法律概念、科技發展的佈雷區與迴避設計、網路知識管理、個案討論等等。在今天快速變動與競爭激烈的經營環境中，屬於無形資產之一的科學技術往往被認為是企業最不容易評估以及最不容易管理的課題，從歷史眼光看，大凡一家公司能夠將本身的技術管理的好並且能即時掌握競爭對手的最新技術動態，通常多能成就一番非凡事業。
description.en: The course is designed as a preliminary management study  for colleae and graduate school students majoring in science and engineering. It is focused on issues related to: Fundamental Principles of Management, Management Information System, The Challenge of Disruptive Technologies to Tradition, The Concept of Technology Law, Forbidden-Area and Design -Around of Research & Development, Networking Knowledge Management and Case Discussions,etc.In today's fast moving and keenly competitive management environment, the evaluation and management of the scientific technology, one of the intangible assets, have been considered the ultimately difficult issues in every business enterprise. From the viewpoint of history, provided that an enterprise  not only can properly manage their own technology but also can get the latest information of their competitors' technologies, it would always accomplish notable achievements.

description.zh: 寶石業為台灣新興的工業之一，集地質學、礦物學、結晶學、切割技術、商業行為及藝術美感於此門學問，寶石礦物的物理及化學性質和鑑定，寶石礦物的生成和產狀及其地理公布，如何加工，銷售行為如何進行，珠寶的設計方式及製造。寶石礦物之顏色分類，內含物之特色，光學現象之表現。人造寶石之製造與辨認，均讓學習者有能力鑑定其真偽，價值與市場行為。
description.en: Introduction the physics and chemistry properties of gemstones.

description.zh: 專業技術不斷開創與努力，如果再配合管理經營的能力，即能相得益彰，成就非凡。工廠管理是用來探討經營或管理工廠的方法，即以工廠管理人員的立場，研究如何應用最有效的方法，來組合應用各項生產要素，以獲得工廠經營的目標。目前工業發展情況，政府的工業措施與方案，以及我國文化背景，都必須與工廠管理的方法結合，才能成為最佳的經營者。
description.en: It would be an extraordinary achievement if an endless creative professional skill can be matched with excellent management ability. This course is used to discuss the method of management or administration, that is to make a research in using the most effective approach to combine all the necessary production elements from the viewpoint of factory management class, so that the management objective can be reached. The current industry development, the initiative and policy of industry, and the culture background of this country all have to be matched with factory management strategy, thus, would become the best management once and for all.

description.zh: 專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case Study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 將熱力學定律應用於計算凝結相之化學位能與其平衡，逸壓和活性因素，溶液熱力學，多元金屬溶液，相圖和相變化，運用電腦模擬相反應和相圖，及研擬冶金數學模式。
description.en: It applies thermaldynamics to calculate the chemical potential energy of condensedphase and its balance, escape pressure, activated factors, solution thermaldynamics, complex metallic solution, phase diagram and phase change. It also utilizes computer simulated phase reaction and phase diagram, and studies the mathematic model of metallurgy.

description.zh: 塑性加工係藉塑性變形將金屬材料變化成目的形狀之金屬加工法。本課程包含：金屬塑性變形之基礎，塑性力學之基礎及各種塑性加工法之介紹，最近之塑性加工技術的進步，並涉及與塑性加工關連之成形技術及適合各種塑性加工材料之選擇。
description.en: Plastic deformation processing is a metal processing method which based on plastic deformation to transform metal material into objective shape. This course includes the foundation of metal plastic deformation, the foundation of plastic dynamics, and the introduction of all kinds of plastic deformative processing methods. The recent technology development of plastic deformation processing is related to formation technique and suitable for alternatives to all kinds of plastic deformation materials.

description.zh: 具有半流體特性的粉體，其在產業上之應用範圍相當地廣，可說是涵蓋了所有的產業。其中在礦業、窯業、陶瓷業、水泥業、冶金業等工業與粉體工程有密切關係。所以，研習本課程主要的目的是讓學生對錯綜複雜的粉體問題，能有基本上的認識與了解。本課程安排的內容包括：粉粒體的定義、粉體之生成、粉體之構造與特性、粉體的物性、粉體的分離、混合、貯藏、輸送、計測與工業安全衛生等項目。
description.en: With the characteristics of semi-fluid, powder has a wide variety of applications,it covers all industries. Among of them, mineral, kiln, ceramics, cement, metallurgyindustry have a very close relationship with powder industry. Therefore, the majorpurpose of this course is to let student have basic perception and understanding tothe complex powder problems.The content of this course includes the definitionof powder body, the formation of powder body, the structure and characteristicsof powder body, the property of powder body, the separation, mixting, storage,transportation and measurement of powder body, and industry safety and sanitation.

description.zh: 主要介紹陶瓷之製程及所應用的範圍.
description.en: Introduction to The processes of ceramics materials and their application

description.zh: 資源處理的主要對象為礦物，但其他有些固體與固體間或固體與液體間之分離與純化也包括在本工程之內，採用的方法：凡是各分離物間不同之物理及化學性質，皆可設法加以利用。本課程則針對其應用方法加以介紹，以期學生對資源處理有一初步及完整的認識。授課內容包括：粉粒體之簡介、篩及篩分、碎礦機之種類及應用、磨礦機之種類及應用、分級及分級機、重液選礦、浮游選礦、磁選機之種類及應用等。
description.en: Mineral processing uses various techniques to perform solid-solid and soild-liguid separation and concentration by using physical and chemical properties between different minerals. The separation and concentration methods include particle size analysis, screening, crushing, grinding, pulverizing, classification, heavy medium separation, flotation, magnetic separation, etc.

description.zh: 由基本應力、應變分析等之介紹，進而介紹岩石的物理性質及其實驗方法，包括耐蝕性、耐凍性、力學性質(抗壓、抗拉、抗撓、抗剪、內磨擦角、凝聚力)、硬度、容積性質、靜態與動態彈性係數、潛變性。並介紹彈性破壞理論。
description.en: introduction to rock mechanics

description.zh: 課程內容包含：(1)緒論、(2)運輸系統規劃、(3)公路工程概述、(4)交通工程概述、(5)鐵路工程概述、(6)航空工程概述、(7)港灣工程概述。
description.en: Integrated transportation systems from the standpoint of assembly,haul,and distribution means.Analysis of transportequipment and traveled way.Power requirements,speed, stopping,capacity,economics,route location.Future technological developments and innovations.

description.zh: 土壤沖蝕1.農地水土保持,水土保持工程,土石流(1)小集水區求Q--合理化公式,滯洪池設計,個案研究,水土保持計畫研擬,專題討論.
description.en: Fluid mechanics,Hydrology,Statistics introduction.Soil erosion,Debris flow,Rational,Detention basin design.Agricultural soil conservation,Soil conservation engineering,Proposal writing,Case stud(Typhoon Herbur).Seminar.

name.zh: 工程監測與非破壞性檢測

description.zh: 本課內容將從最基本的量測觀念,理論,推導主工程實務的應用.例如:應力與應變的關係,應變計的種類(Foil type以及半導體),應變計的電路及按裝,溫度及非線性效應,LVDT量測原理,荷主儀的製作原理,非破壞性檢測的種類及原理,超音波檢測原理及實例.
description.en: This course will introduce the basic concept and theory of measurement,and engineering application.such as:stress-strain relation. types of strain gange(foil and semicondust),basic circuits.effects of temperature and nonlinearity,theory and applocation of LVDT and load cell.theory of nondestructive testing and its application.

description.zh: 上水道工程為當前國家重要之工程建設,本課程主要包括管渠系統設計及污水處理系統設計,授課內容涵蓋暴雨逕流計算,管渠水力學及管線系統設計,污水處理系統之規劃,污水處理單元之設計,固體物之處理與處置以及水回收再利用等重要基本知識.
description.en: The objective of this course is going to introduce the Sewage Engineering.

description.zh: 介紹工程成本運算的各種方法，藉由不同的數學分析技巧，推估並了解不同工程資金運用方案的差異性，以為決策評估及成本控制的依據。
使同學對土壤性質及受力後之行為有所認識，進而應用至基礎工程。課程內容：土壤成因、土壤物理及指數性質、土壤分類、滲透與滲流、土層內之應力分析、土壤壓縮、土壤剪力強度、側向土壓力、淺基之土壤承載力分析、邊坡穩定分析、土壤夯實。
description.en: Soil exploration and groundwater sampling;in-situ determination of properties using the split spoon,cone,dilatometer,pressuremeter,and vane equipment.Instrumentation for monitoring field performance and challeges associated with exploration and monitoring ingeotechnica/geoenvironmental engineering.

description.zh: 本課程以計算力學之理論為經，結構分析之方法為緯，教導修習學生將結構學之基本觀念徹底融通。其內容主要在說明變分原理，應用於結構分析之原理及方法，並介紹計算力學與古典力學應用於結構分析之差別及優點，使學生能對結構力學有更深刻的瞭解。
description.en: Fundamental theory of statically indeterminate structures; analysis of indeterminate beams, frames, and trusses by stiffness and flexibility methods; study of influence lines for beams, frames, and trusses.

description.zh: 本課程主要教導學生營建工程生命週期的各種管理技能,諸如規劃,設計,發包,施工等階段的相關管理技術都會加以探討,學生可藉由學習課程的過程而體會營建工程的管理精義.
description.en: This course will introduce management techniques during life cycle of construction engineering. All relative techniques in each process of plan,design,contract and construction will be discussed. Students can learn the capability of engineering management after this class.

name.en: State-the-art Constrution of Civil Engineering Techniques

description.zh: 本課程以講授廢棄物之中間處理與最終處置之方法與技術為主,使學生瞭解廢棄物妥善清除處理之原理,此包括: 1.廢棄物種類與含義 2.廢棄物分類收集與清運 3.焚化處理 4.固化處理 5.掩埋處置 6.特殊處理方法 7.廢棄物處理廠之規劃
description.en: To promote the knowledge of principle for students ,the course ,Waste Treatment and Disposal, focuses on middle treatment and final disposal of waste. Contents of the course include: Definition and classification of waste. Storage and transportation, Incineration, Fixation, Landfill and Overall planning of treatment plant.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 目的在使學生瞭解電腦基本知識及程式撰寫方法，以應用於土木工程問題之處理與解決。授課內容包括：電子計算機概論、資料型態、程式語言、輸出入陳述與格式、迴圈及副程式、檔案開啟，及其他應用套裝軟體之介紹。
description.en: Specifications of language syntax and semantics by grammars and automata and by attribute grammars,denotational semantics,and action equations;algebraic,denotational,and operational semantics,application of formal specifications to construction of software tools.

description.zh: 1.線性聯立微分方程2.向量分析3.富利葉級數及富利葉積分4.偏微分方程及邊界值問題
description.en: This course deals with the following subjects:Ⅰ.Ordinary Differential Equations   Ⅱ.Laplace TnangformsⅢ.Vector AnalysisⅣ.Matrices and DeterminantsⅤ.Fourier SeriesⅥ.Partial Differential Equatians

description.zh: 土木工程師到底是大地的彫刻師？還是地球的劊子手？透過本課程的介紹與討論，將可使未來的土木工程師及早在「利用厚生，利國利民」與「尊重自然與保護人類」之間思考其應尋的方向，擺脫「一群有知識的野蠻人」之惡名，達成「永續利用」與「天人合一」建設目標。
description.en: How can Civil Engineer construct the infrastracture without destroying environmental system ? In this course,we try to search and discuss the suitable solutions.

description.zh: 使同學進一步獲得土壤力學之重要觀念與理論，授課內容含粘土礦物、滲透與滲流、土壤內之應力分析、壓密理論與沈陷分析、剪力強度應力軌跡與土壤之側向土壓力、邊坡穩定分析。
description.en: Intermediate soil mechanics is an advanced knowledge following soil mechanics, and is designed to apply soil mechanics to underground excavation such as shield tunneling as well as pipe jacking. This lecture will try to help students to use the theory in soil mechanics applying into how to select tunneling optimum method and type of vertical shaft. In addition, how to manage the chamber pressure and spoil return. Field trips will be arranged to provide students more opportunities to apply what they learn in the class to be verified in the construction site.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹微生物及其應用，學生將可習得何謂微生物，微生物如何運作，以及微生物的應用。課程內容包括: (1)微生物的分類、型態、結構及一般特性; (2)微生物的生長與控制; (3)微生物的生理與代謝; (4)微生物的應用，例如生物轉換、一次及二次代謝產物的生產、基因重組蛋白的生產、核酸藥物的生產等。
description.en: The objective of the course is to introduce the major concepts, principles and applications of microbiology. Students will learn about what microorganisms are, how they function, and their industrial applications. The course include the following topics: (1) Classification and structures; (2) Microbial growth and control; (3) Microbial physiology and metabolism; (4) Applications, such as biotransformation, production of primary and secondary metabolites, production of recombinant proteins, etc.

description.zh: 本課程之授課目標為培養學生具備特用化學品基本知識、合成方法及應用原理。特用化學品種類包括：電子用特化品、塑膠用特化品、紡織用特化品及其他工業之特化品（如界面活性劑）。
description.en: An introductory course focuses on chemicals which are sold at high prices in relatively limited volumes. The scope of fine chemicals includes surfactants, plastic additives, catalysts, pesticides, flavors & fragrances, dyes & pigments, bulk medicines, etc. Topics concerning about the manufacturing processes, application principles and recent developments of fine chemicals are also discussed in this course.

description.zh: 本課程包含用於移植、非移植和體外的材料。移植的材料包含縫線、人工血管、人工心臟、人工骨頭、韌帶、藥物徐放裝置、人工皮膚、人工肝臟等。非移植的材料有醫療用衣服、繃帶、注射器材、診療用材料等。體外的材料包含透析膜、人工肺、人工導管等。
description.en: Biomaterials is an introductory course designed for biomaterial compositions, manufacture, functionality and implantability. Biomaterials included in the course are sutures, vascular grafts, artificial organs, artificial tissues,etc. In addition, biocompatibility, biodegradability, carcinogenicity and toxicity of biomaterials are presented in detail.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程以高分子加工時所遇到之問題，分單元講述，其內容包括： (I) 高分子加工學之基礎(a)輸送現象(b)高分子黏彈學(c)高分子混煉。 (II)高分子加工學之應用(a)壓模法(b)沖模法(c)反應沖模法(d)絲線成形 等專題。
description.en: The course focuses on the "trouble shooting" in the polymer processing . Both theoretical and practical topics will be included. The main contents are devided into the following units : (I)Fundamental Studies:(a)Transport Phenomena (b)Viscoelastic Properties of Polymer Melt (c)Polymer Compounding and Blending. (II)Practical Studies:(a)Compression Molding (b)Injection Molding (c)Reaction Injection Molding (d)Fiber Formation (e)Membrane Formation.

description.zh: 本課程係討論各種纖維之化學組成、合成與成形之理論，同時針對纖維之性質、纖維改質與組成、合成、成形間之關係與影響因素及檢測加以講授。
description.en: A major object of this course is to provide a background in fiber compositions, synthesis, spinning and characterization. A second goal is to introduce factors that influence fiber compositions, formation and properties and their testing.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在於由分子結構觀點介紹各種材料之種類、性質及用途，並針對分子科學相關的基本原理方法機構及應用做概括性的介紹。內容著重於功能性有機及無機分子，例如非線性光學分子，液晶分子，有機發光分子，半導體材料，分子元件及藥物分子。所包括之課程主題如下：1.分子、原子、分子團的基本概念2.分子性質與作用力間之學理3.有機材料分子之設計、製備、分析及應用4.無機材料分子之設計、製備、分析及應用5.分子元件之簡介6.藥物設計及原理7.分子科學之遠景及未來發展
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the basic principles, methods, mechanisms and applications in molecular science.  Special focus will be on the discussion of functionalized organic and inorganic molecules, such as NLO, LC, OLED, semiconductors, molecular devices and drugs.  This course will cover the following topics: 1. The concepts of atoms, molecules, and clusters 2.Properties- forces theories. 3.Rational design, preparation, characterization and application of organic materials 4.Rational design, preparation, characterization and application of inorganic materials. 5.Introduction to molecular devices. 6.Drug discovery. 7.Prospective vision of molecular science.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在培養學生論文尋找及期刊選讀之能力，每位學生必須針對專一之問題尋找最近相關的資料。問題的認定，由老師協助資料之準備及口頭報告等是學生不可少的。且一學期至少須報告1次。學期成績將以學生在課堂上參與的態度及兩份書面資料決定。
description.en: This course is aimed at providing a training of review and paper studies for 4th grade students. Students are requested to search for the latest papers for a specific topic. Presentation and discussion are required for all attendants, twice persemester. The final score for a student will be determined based on students interaction in the class and two written reports.

description.zh: 此課程之目標是講授生物化學原理，包含生物分子構形、代謝能源之製造與儲存，生物大分子之合成，基因訊息，人類生化之觀點。
description.en: The aim of this course is to introduce the principle of biochemistry, including biomolecular conformation, generation and storage of metabolic energy, biosynthesis of macromolecular precursors, genetic information, some aspects of human biochemistry.

description.zh: 本門授課之目的在介紹各種有機化合物之合成方法、原理及應用，並探討有機實驗室常用之有機反應及其反應機構。
description.en: The course introduces various kinds of organic synthetic methods, principles and applications.  The most commonly used organic reactions and their mechanisms are also discussed.

description.zh: 介紹各類紡織纖維之染色理論與基本染色方法；包括染料應用上之分類與紡織物纖維的類別，一般染色之理論，染色機械之類別，纖維素纖維、蛋白質纖維、聚酯纖維、聚醯胺纖維、聚丙烯睛纖維及其混紡織物的染色原理及應用以及各種纖維染色缺點以及防止與修正缺點之方法。
description.en: Introducing the dyeing theory and dyeing method of various textile fibers; which include the classification of dyestuffs and textile fibers, the dyeing machine, the dyeing theory and dyeing methods of cellulosic fibers, protein fibers, synthetic fibers and their blends, also the cause and correction of dyeing defects.

description.zh: 本課程的目的是讓學生對材料電性行為的理論與應用能有清晰完整的認識，第一部份以古典理論觀點來解釋導體、半導體、超導、絕緣體及介電材料；第二部分以近代量子理論解釋金屬半導體及有機共軛分子的能帶理論即能階與能隙之概念；第三部分光電元件實例：發光二極體，光電二極體，場效應電極體等。
description.en: This course is an introduction to the electronic properties of materials. PartⅠ: using only"classical (pre-quantum)ideas"to introduce the concepts of electrical conductivity, light transmission, index of refraction, dielectric constant. Part Ⅱ: introducing quantum mechanics to elucidate the band theory of metals, semiconductors, and organic conjugated molecules. PartⅢ: few examples of optoelectronic devices, like p-n junction, light-emitting diodes (LEDs), field effect transistors etc.

description.zh: 本課程係講述機械設計的基本原則以及紡織機械的種類、類型與演變，並由紡織工業的發展趨勢預測紡織機械未來的發展方向。
description.en: This course introduces students the fundamental principles of machine design, history and variation of textile machinery. The trend of textile machinery development to cope with the development of textile industries is also mentioned.

description.zh: 1.簡介，2.個人電腦（PC-486）之界面，3. 視窗作業系統，Visual Basic 及Borland C++ 3.1 語言，4.視窗應用界面(API)，動態脫結程式庫 (DLL)，動態資料交換 (DDE) 及物件連結崁入(OLE) 基本程式設計，5.客戶應用程式及服務者應用程式的架構設計，6.多媒體，影像壓縮和運動，7.簡介人工智慧，專家系統，Fuzzy 及 Neural 網路，8.圖形監控系統：A. IODDE, B. NETDDE, C. 物件導向圖控, D. 分散式控制網路，9.論文研討。
description.en: 1.introduction to personal computer interface.2.Windows operation system : V.B.or VC++.3.Program design for Dynamic link library (DLL).4.Program design for Dynamic Data exchange (DEE).5.Device Driver writing for windows :I.O.DDEand NETDDE.6.Multi-media and Virtual Reality Internet.7.Introduction to A.I.and Fuzzy-Neural Network .8.Object-Qriented graphic control user interface.

description.zh: 課程綱要： 1.半導體元件簡介 2.物理氣相沉積 3.化學氣相沉積 4.微影─光阻覆蓋，曝光，顯影 5.蝕刻─濕式蝕刻，乾式蝕刻 6.攙雜─擴散法，離子植入法 7.氧化和熱處理製程
description.en: Course Outline： 1.Introduction to Semiconductor Device 2.Physical Vapor Deposition 3.Chemical Vapor Deposition 4.Photolithography─photoresist coating, exposure, development 5.Etching─wet etching, dry etching 6.Doping─diffusion, ion implantation 7.Oxidation and Thermal Treatment Process

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 1.集合,序列與函數2.基礎邏輯3.關聯式4.計數（排列,組合）5.圖與樹（基礎圖論）6.遞迴式與演算法7.有向圖
description.en: 1.Sets Sequences and Function2.Elementary Logic3.Relations4.Counting5.Graph and Tree6.Recursion Trees and Algorithms7.Digraphs

description.zh: 1.光纖概論，2.光纖波導，3.光纖傳輸特特性，4.光纖與光纜，5.光纖連接，6.光源與檢光器，7.光纖系統，8.光纖量測，9.光纖應用與未來發展。
description.en: 1.Introduction 2.Waveguide of optical fibers3.Propagation in optical fibers4.Optical fibers and opotical cable5.Fiber connectors6.Light sources and detectors7.Optical fiber communication systems8.Measurement of optical fiber communication systems9.Applications

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 1.資料表示法：定點系統(Fixed Point System)，浮點系統(Floating Point System)，2.運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3.指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計(Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計(Microprogramming)，4.記憶系統：記憶體之層次(Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統(Virtualmemory)，快速記憶(Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control4.Memory organization5.Processor organization

name.en: Analysis and Simulation of Integrated Circuits

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來分析與模擬類比及數位積体電路,進而能培養學生具有設計積体電路的能力,課程內容包念：1. 電腦輔助設計積体電路介紹2. 類比積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( SPICE Design center )3. 數位積体電路設計軟体之介紹及使用 ( Viewlogic )4. PLD的認識與介紹5. FPGA ( Xilinx )的設計6. 專題設計
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the analysis and simulation of integrated circuits(digital & analysis) .Therefore,the student have the design capability of integrated.The contents of this course :1.introduction to the Computer-aided IC design 2.Introduction to the computer-aided deaign of analysis    integrated circuits(SPICE ,Deaign Center)and computer-  exercise3.Introduction to the computer-aided design of digital integrated circuits(Viewlogic)and computer-exercise4.Introduction to the PLD5.FPGA(XILINX)design and computer-exercise6.Project.

description.zh: 1.電場強度電通密度、磁場強度、磁通密度電荷與電流之介紹;2.材料之導電特性，介電特性與導磁特性之介紹;3.向量數學分析之複習;4.馬克斯威爾方程式與羅倫磁力;5.靜電場之介紹;6.靜電問題之解決;7.靜磁場之介紹;8.靜磁問題之解決。
description.en: To make the students understand the basic concepts and applications of Electromafneties which includes :1.Electromafnetic Model.2.The Vector Analysis.3.Static Electric Fields.4.Electrostatic Problems`Solutions.5.Steady Eletric Currents.6. Steat Mafnetic Fields.7.Time Varying Fields and Maxwells`Equations.8.Plane Electromapnetic Waves.9.Theory and Applications of Transmission Lines.10.Wavef uide and Carity Resonators.11.Antenna and Radiation Theory.

description.zh: 1.信號與系統緒論，2.連續時間性系統的分析，3.連續時間性系統狀態變數分析，4.連續時間性系統信號的傅立葉分析，5. Z轉換分析，6.離散時間性系統分析，7.離散時間性系統的狀態變數分析，8.離散時間性信號的傅立葉分析，9.拉普拉斯轉換分析，10.線性系統綜合分析。

description.zh: 探討產品機能和成本配合的關係，綜合企業內所有知識和技能，做有系統、有組織的設計、材料種類、與型態改善，以達成降低成本，提高製程功能和品質。
description.en: Value Management (VM) is an organized, systematic approach to obtaining optimal value for every industry. The learning and training topics are: the system approach, opportunities, application and methodology for value management. Also, involve managing project value through lift cycle costing, problem solving and project value and case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在介紹如何運用企業內與員工之有關資源，包括其能力、知識、技術、態度和激勵、以配合企業整體競爭策略和形式。其內容計有：人力資源的分析、策略及目標、支援性作業之取得、發展及報酬，人力資源的維護。
description.en: This course is intended as an introduction to the field of human resources management. How a corporate fully utilizes its internal resources-employees, including their capabilities, knowledge, techniques, attitudes and motivation to fit its corporate competitive strategy. This course includes human resources analysis, strategy and targets, the access, development and reward of supportive operations, and the maintenance of human resources.

description.zh: 由於科技進步，交通發達，縮短了各區域間之距離，製造業面臨了許多衝擊，因此如何在全球市場上佔有一席之地是現代經營與管理者必須思考的。本課程主要是整合市場機能、顧客導向、行銷企畫、生產製造、研究發展、人力資源、社會責任、工業安全及環境保護等領域，其重點涵蓋：如何架構企業組織，使其製造生產的產品能滿足市場需求、如何結合市場機能與製造功能，使企業永續經營、如何生產產品，使其具有市場競爭力、探討產品成功之關鍵點，使競爭策略具體化、探討新的思考方式以發展出具有競爭性的策略。
description.en: This course is dedicated to integrate the marketing functions, customer orientation, market planning, production, R&D, human resources, community responsibilities, industrial safety and environmental protection.  Its emphasis includes development of corporate organization, integration of market and manufacturing functions, production of goods, discover of product CSF and discussion of new thinking approaches.

description.zh: 介紹設施規劃，合理化的觀念、原理、方法步驟，舊規劃合理化的理由、重要性、方法及步驟。設施搬運系統及位置的遴選、及其考慮因素及決定方法
description.en: This course introduces the concepts, theories, and approaches of facilities planning.  Material handling and site selection are also included.

description.zh: 介紹系統分析的基本概念及方法，深入熟悉開發一個電腦化資訊系統之方法及步驟。包含：系統分析、系統設計、系統建置、系統運轉、系統評鑑等之實施方式及步驟。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concept and approaches for system analysis.  Besides, the methods and procedures for developing a computerized information system is also discussed.  It includes system analysis, system design, system development, system implementation and system evaluation.

description.zh: 探討投資管理的基本概念。內容有:實質資產、金融資產、金融市場、金融工具、經濟分析、產業分析、個別公司分析、基本分析、技術分析、投資報酬與風險、投資組合管理。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of investment management, including real assets, financial assets, financial markets, financial instrument, industrial analysis, corporate analysis, investment return and risk, portfolio management.

description.zh: 介紹資訊整合與交換的概念。藉由作業程序的改造及資訊技術與標準的應用，將業務上所必要的資訊電子化、標準化、以建立全球共通商業系統的無紙作業環境。
description.en: Introduce the idea of information integration and exchange for the commercial environment. Also, by applying the business procedure reengineering and information technology to establish necessary standard for paperless commercial environment.

With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 其主要是建立系統化的服務系統設計與服務作業管理方式，其內容：服務業本質的瞭解、服務設計、服務系統規劃、服務廠址選擇、服務場所佈置、服務程序設計、服務自動化及電腦化、服務作業管理人員管理、儀器設備管理、服務存貨管理、服務等候線管理、服務績效管理等。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the development, design and management of service systems.  The contents include introduction of service industry, service design, service systems planning, site selection, layout, service process design, service automation, service process management, facility management, inventory control, queuing, performance management.

description.zh: 介紹資料庫系統之基本概念，熟悉基本指令及操作方法，使之能輕易建立資料檔案，並可對其資料進行擷取、添加、刪除、修改、編輯、排序、建立索引及產生標準報表列印等，且開發一套簡易應用軟體。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of database system.  The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file.  In addition, the retrieval, add, delete, modify, edit and sorting of data files are also provided.  Finally, the students can develop a DBMS for themselves.

description.zh: 介紹會計學之基本觀念， 會計循環 - 包括分錄、過帳、試算、結算及財務報表之編製。逐一說明財務報表各個項目，最後並介紹財務報表之分析。修畢本課程之後能瞭解會計學之基本原理，會計資料處理及財務報表產生之整個過程，以及簡單之財務報表分析技術，並為未來之企業及財務相關課程打下良好基礎。
description.en: This course introduces the basic concepts of accounting.  All the necessary processes are included as well the financial report analysis.  After being taking this course, the student can understand the accounting concepts, accounting data process, generation of accounting report and techniques for analyzing the financial report.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為2學分。本課程內容為：零災害、指認呼喚、預知危險、衛生防護具及儀器之保養檢查及使用、職業災害之調查與處理、特殊器械的使用、工作環境認知－通風、採光、噪音、缺氧、輻射。
description.en: The course includes zero disaster, recognition calling, danger pre-recognition, sanitation protection facilities and their maintenance, survey and arrangement of vocational danger, use of special facilities, and recognition of working environment, e.g. brightness, radiation and noise.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: Linear programming, Network analysis, Dynamic programming, Game theory, (Non)Integer linear programming, Markov chains(Markovian decision process), Queueing theory, Inventory models, Forecasting models, Decision analysis and system simulation.

description.zh: 本課程內容共分零售基本概念、零售規劃技巧、零售機構之管理、零售之行銷組合及零售之應用與未來趨勢等五篇。第一篇「零售基本概念」，介紹零售的本質，描述零售機構的型態及台灣零售業之發展與未來趨勢。第二篇「零售規劃技巧」，說明如何訂定零售策略及進行零售研究，闡述商圈規劃與分析，並且探討零售地點選擇的決策流程與評估技術。第三篇「零售機構之管理」，先敘述零售組織規劃，然後討論零售業人力資料管理的程序及重點，也論及零售機構財務規劃、分析及預算制度。第四篇「零售行銷組合」，以行銷組合（產品、訂價、通路及促銷）之概念，分別討論店面設計與商品展示、商品採購與管理，零售訂價技巧及步驟，零售促銷規劃與活動。第五篇「零售之應用與未來趨勢」，將零售管理之學理及概念應用於更廣泛之場合，包括直接銷售（Direct Selling）及綠色零售（Green Retailing），最後針對零售管理之未來趨勢探討科技應用在零售管理，網路行銷及虛擬商店。
description.en: There are five sections in this course. The first section；the basic concepts of retailing which the fundamental concepts, the models of organization and the future tendency are introduced. The second section；the skills of retailing planning, the strategy and research are discussed. The analysis of business circle and store location are decided by several different technologies. The third section；the way of establishing organization and managing the human resources, the financial planning, and budgeting are included. The fourth section；the combination of marketing, the concept of 4P（product, price, path and promotion）, the shop design and product demonstration, produce purchasing and managing, the decision of price and the activities of promotion are included. The fifth section；the future implementation of retailing, the direct selling and green retailing are included. The use of high-tech in retailing, Internet marketing and virtual store are discussed in this section.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。

description.zh: 本課程內容為：工業心理的意義、發展、研究、功能及範圍。員工的態度、士氣、參與、溝通障礙之處理。市場研究、領導行為。管理心理旨在探討組織中人與事的問題；從對人員的動機、認知、學習、態度等得個別行動差異之研究，到團體行為與效能之探討，藉以促進組織發展，提昇管理績效。探討之內容包括：態度、工作滿足、性格、知覺、激勵、學習、領導、溝通、權力、衝突、組織文化、組織結構、團體動力學等。
description.en: In the course, the following topics will be discussed: overview of industrial psychology, including personnel psychology, engineering psychology, consumer psychology.

description.zh: 本課程在二技為品質管理。使學生瞭解品質管理的觀念、原理、領域。品管部門的組織、功能，如何管理產品或服務的品質，品管的工具、方法，如何持續改善品質的方法，品質表示法，如何評估品質管理成效，相關法令，品質管理未來趨勢。

name.en: Operation and Management of Real Estate

description.zh: 本課程主要目的為提供學生瞭解不動產開發案相關之理論基礎及實務經驗。不動產經營所涉及的領域甚廣，因此課程內容安排著重實務討論及法令解說，藉由案例分享瞭解地方政府落實開發建設可能涉及的資源課題與對策，例如容積獎勵、稅賦減免、都市計畫變更及容積移轉等；另外開發案財務分析導論及比較，讓學生可以系統性的認識各種類型不動產開發案之收益、稅制、規劃限制及風險等，除了增加實務的認識，對於個人理財亦有幫助。課程內容包含1.基礎財務分析、2.不動產相關法令解說、3.不動產產品規劃及銷售實務、4.不動產開發流程及實務、5.產業創新案例分享、6.產業政策與方向及7.實際案例參訪等。
description.en: The course provides both theoretical and pragmatic knowledge in real estate management. Course contents emphasize on practical recitations and codes commentaries. Factors such as area-allowanced incentives, tax reductions, amendments in city planning, and transfer area allowance are addressed in each case study. In addition, financial benefits, tax regulations, design constraints, and risk assessment in development different types are presented in systematic manner thru the course. Course topics include: 1. Fundamental financial analyses. 2. Real estate regulations and codes. 3. Real estate planning and marketing. 4. Procedures in real estate development. 5. Innovations in practice. 6. Real estate policy. 7. Visitation in projects.

name.en: Introduction to History of Western Architecture

description.zh: 本課程主要在教導學生對西方(歐洲及西亞)認識歷史建築之演進過程與思考涵構，並使學生具備西方文化歷史與思想的相關知識，其主要授課內容如下：1.在範圍上--自古埃及、西亞、古典建築、基督教建築、中世紀的大教堂時代以至文藝復興及17、18世紀的建築歷史。2.在思想上--自希臘的文化與哲學思想談起，以至各時代之政治、宗教與社會文明之演進，瞭解歷史涵構及其對建築的表現。3.在建築上─針對每一時期的建築表現，瞭解其構造方法、材料應用及相關細部特徵。
本課程在培養學生具備在建築專業設計時輔助其執行外部環境塑造的基本能力與認知。主要教學內容包括：一、景觀建築之基礎專業概說與相關範疇之界定：1.景觀建築專業之界定、範疇、演變、2.景觀建築之相關範疇之界定生態學、園藝學；二、景觀建築之人文背景：1.景觀建築之風格演變、2.景觀建築之人文因子概說；三、景觀建築之研究方法與內涵：1.景觀建築之定性研究方法解析、2.景觀建築之定量研究方法解析。
description.en: The course aims at the training of undertaking design for outdoor environment within architectural discipline. Contents of the course mainly includes:1.	Definition of landscape architecture and the relevant categories.1)	Definition, realm, and development in landscape profession2)	Defining relevant disciplines such as horticulture, ecology, and architecture. 2.	Human aspects  1)	The transformation of landscape modes and styles2)	Human factors 3.	Landscape Research Methods 1)	Qualitative Research in landscape 2)	Quantitative Research in landscape

description.zh: 現今全球正處於電腦e世代時候，文字、影像、聲音、影片被廣泛的運用來傳送信息及資訊流通上。而如何來組織這些文字、影像、聲音、影片等資料就顯的非常必須且重要了。本課程將指導學生如何掌握現今市面上之電腦多媒體應用工具並將以應用在建築領域上。
description.en: Text, image, audio, video are common used to transmit information now. How to organize and represent these different kinds of data became an important issue. This course will help you to master some computer multimedia tools in architecture filed.

description.en: Thermodynamic Properties of Substance, Energy Forms, The First Law of Thermodynamics, The Second Law of Thermodynamics, Irreversibility & Availability, Power Cycle, Refrigeration Systems, Mixtures, Chemical Reactions.

description.zh: 先修課程:負責教授同意半導體元件、整流電路，電晶體和電路，運算放大器、線性積體電路，邏輯元件，數位電路，數位積體電路，微處理器，放大器等。
description.en: Semiconductor Device, Rectifier circuit, Transistor Circuit, Operational Amplifier, Linear Integrated Circuit, Logic Device, Digital Circuit, Digital Integrated Circuit, Micro Processor, Amplifier, etc..

description.zh: 本科目將由基本吸收式系統內，相關作動媒體及冷媒之行為等認識，進而學習更具高效率之各種形式吸收式系統裝置上之最佳設計能力。並且利用能源有效利用手法，導入冷熱系統工程上之實際應用規劃，以期發揮吸收式系統在各類狀況下的最能節省能源總體成本之特性。
description.en: The absorption heat pump, mainly based on absorption refrigerating machine in its cycle, is well-accepted with growing demand in air conditioning or process heating market.As the absorption cycle is a kind of heat process reaction, the absorption heat pump has wider application than any other heat pump systems have. This course outlines the classification, theory and characteristics of the absorption heat pump.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 介紹真空技術基本概念、各種真空泵原理、真空元件用材料特性、各種真空元件及其材料特性、真空壓力量測技術、真空計工作原理、真空系統設計、真空測漏技術及真空系統之各種應用，使用和維修。
description.en: An introduction course for the basic concept of vacuum technology, vacuum pump, system components and their material properties. The measuring methods of vacuum system, working principals of vacuum meter, system design, leak-detecting technology and the applications of vacuum system will also be presented.

description.en: This course introduces the refrigeration engineering and its system design; the contents cover the following topics: the principles of refrigeration engineering, the equipment and designs of different refrigeration systems, refrigeration load calculations, design and calculation of refrigerant piping, and refrigeration storage design.

description.zh: 基本控制系統的動作方式、位置控制、比例控制、積分控制、微分控制、各種組合控制、氣壓控制裝置、電動及電子控制裝置、液壓控制裝置、空調設備上的各種控制包括溫度、壓力、風量、濕度等之控制。
description.en: To provide students with the concepts of control actions: two position control, proportional control, floating control, integral control, derivative control; to familiarize students with pneumatic control devices, fluid control devices, damper & valves, elementary control systems on HVAC & R systems, include: temperature control, humidity control, static pressure control, flow control and so on.

description.zh: 各種冷煤壓縮機簡介，容積式壓縮機效率分析，離心式壓縮機分析，各種送風機簡介，送風機應用，泵之應用分析。
description.en: Introduction to refrigerant compressors, efficiency analysis of volumetric compressors, analysis of centrifugal compressors, introduction to fans, applications of fans, and application of pumps.

description.zh: 各種冷凍空調用熱交換器之介紹，熱交換器應用分析，熱交換增強簡介，鰭電分析，熱交換效率分析及熱交換器結垢問題分析。
description.en: Introduction to the heat exchangers used in HVAC & R, application of heat exchangers, heat exchange enhancement analysis, fin analysis, heat exchange efficiency analysis, and discussion on fouling of heat exchangers.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹工程上、物理上系統解析的相關數學工具，內容包括五大項：一 常微分方程式：一階，二階，及高階常微分方程，拉譜拉斯轉換   ，特殊函數。 二 向量幾何與分析：矩陣行列式及特徵問題。 三 傅立葉級數，積分及轉換。四 偏微分方程及邊界值問題。 五 複變分析及映射轉換。
description.en: This course intends to introduce the mathematical principles and practices that today's engineers need to know. The course contents are1. Ordinary Differential Eqs: 1st order, 2nd order and    higher order ODEs. Laplace transform, special function.2. Vector Algebra and Vector Analysis: Matrixes and       Determinants, Eigenvalue problems. 3. Fourier Series, Integral and Transforms.4. Partial Differential Equations and Boundary    ValueProblems.5. Complex Analysis: complex Integration, conformal mapping    and Applications.

name.zh: 冷凍空調熱力熱傳學(一)

description.zh: 由介紹基本熱傳有關現象，配合熱力守恆有關公式之應用，討論各種熱交換環境下應考慮之因素，分析熱傳導、熱對流、熱輻射及相變熱傳之計算方法。並將要更深入地探討在各不同熱傳導系統內所可能形成之熱力分佈現象，以期學習者能以淺入深地對相關熱傳導系統工程設計上培養出最佳能力。
description.en: Introduction of basic heat transfer phenomena, using thermodynamic conservation equations to discuss the parameters under different heat exchange circumstances, heat conduction, heat convection, heat radiation and phase change are analyzed, discussion on the heat transfer problems in application to cultivate heat transfer design capability.

description.zh: 科技日文主要是以培養閱讀日文科技期刊或論文能力為重點，俾充實大學理工系、所學生參考日文系列技術論文或工程手冊時之理解、翻譯與書寫方式。課程內容包含：    1.論文閱讀練習    2.翻訣技巧    3.技術論文之書寫
description.en: This course will direct students to learn the ability of reading and writing Japanese journals, papers engineering instruction manuals or reference materials. This course include:1.  papers reading practice2.  translation skill3.  technical writing

description.zh: 教授立體三維空間的投影觀念、幾何學製圖方法，訓練繪製草圖、各種物件之三視圖、零件／組合圖及各式剖面變位圖之能力；並能正確標註尺寸及加工表面符號，公差與配合。並且熟悉交線展開之原理，使具備繪製各式管路、鋼架、氣油壓及機械設備之相關標準工程圖的能力。DOS命令，物件導向程式語言Turbo C++整合發展環境，條件與迴圈，陣列與指標，函數，結構，類別與物件，檔案，溢載及繼承關係，文字視窗的應用，繪圖的應用，資料處理的應用，資料結構的應用，數位信號處理的應用，數值分析的應用。
description.en: Instructing the concepts of orthographic projection of 3D space and the methods of geometry graphics. Training the skills to raw sketch, various 3D views, parts/assembly drawings and cross-sectional views. Learning to mark dimensions, manufacturing surface symbols tolerance and fittings correctly. This lesson also demands students to able to be familiarize the intersections and development theorem in order to draw the steel structures, hydraulic and fluid systems, and related mechanical devices as the standard engineering drawings.The course intends to have students to be familiar with computer language programming. It also introduces different computer languages with the purpose of developing student's capability of designing a complete program.

description.zh: 由於休閒產業與生活息息相關，期予學生能充分瞭解休業，將來就業或是對未來休閒生活都會有很大幫助。課程內包括：1.休閒產業簡介、2.休閒的經營系統、3.休閒的型式與活動、4.休閒的顧客服務。
description.en: Because the recreation industry correlation about the life, hope students will understand recreation and have much helpfulness to purse an occupation or life of recreation. The course include:1.The introduction of recreation industry.2.The working system of recreation.3.The play and style of recreation.4.The customer service of recreation.

The course include :1.The introduction of reality.2.The operation & Management of reality industry.3.The panorama of realty.4.Marketing in real estate industry.5. Management in real estate. 6.investement in real estate.

description.zh: 本課程主要分成保險管理介紹，風險管理介紹，風險管理方法，風險管理專題研究
description.en: Part I. Introduction to Insurance and Risk ManagementPart II. Risk Management Methods Part IV. Topics of Risk Management

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解策略管理的意義及其演進, 如何建立公司策略以增加之競爭力。課程主要內容包括：1.策略管理的意義, 2.企業內外在環境分析, 3.策略制定, 4.策略執行與評估, 5.事業階層策略, 6.公司策略, 7.購併。
description.en: The objective of the course is to establish a set of frameworks for the formulation and implementation of strategy. Topics of the course include SWOT, strategy formulation, strategy implementation, business-level strategy, corporate-level strategy, and merger & acquisition.

description.zh: 本課程之目的在使同學對財務管理之專業知識產生一概略的認識，期望同學能瞭解資金之運用、籌措及管理之一些觀念及技巧，並做為未來進行相關財務決策或進一步研究財務理論之基礎。本課程會將攸關財務的主題加以介紹,包含：1.財務報表分析2.時間價值，債券與股票3.投資決策與折現分析4.風險、報酬與資金成本5.公司融資政策6.資本結構與股利政策7.財務規畫8.合併與購併9.風險管理
description.en: This purpose of this course is to help undergraduate students to understand the basic concept and issues in corporate finance.This course will focus on basic issues in corporate finance, such as:1. Financial Statement Analysis 2. Valuing Bonds and Stocks3. Capital Budgeting Decisions4. Risk, Return, and Cost of Capital5. Corporate Financing Decisions6. Capital Structure and Dividend Policy7. Financial Planning8. Mergers and Acquisitions9. Risk Management.

description.en: The Evolution and Function of Money, The Financial System of Taiwan, The Funds of Finance and Financial Market, The Sources of Funds in Commercial Bank, The Uses of Funds in Commercial Bank, The Creation of Deposits, Information Cost and Financial Structure, The Regulation of Banking Industry, Theory of Money Demand

description.zh: 電子商務的應用與發展已對企業經營與生活方式造成相當大的衝擊，在網路發展先驅與先行導入區域已逐漸將網路應用納入企業日常運作以及居家生活中的一部份。這些應用無論我們從媒體(media)功能、通路(channel)功能來區分，或是從對象來分為B2B、B2C、C2C以及企業內部之應用，其企業經營的方式與傳統模式有許多的不同，因而也衍生許多有趣、重要課題。
description.en: Introduction to Electronic Commerce (E-commerce)- information evolution- information network, telecommunication and business - information society (4C)‥ Discussion of business to business operations (Extranet)‥ Discussion of business to consumer services (Internet) and internet marketing ‥ Discussion of organization management and control (Intranet)‥ Discussion of e-commerce systems and technology support

description.zh: 本課程主在讓學生瞭解服務業的重要性和特性.如何作好服務並使顧客滿意。 內容:服務業概論、服務傳送系統、服務業地點選擇、服務品質、生產力和品質改善、預測、服務業的經營策略、個案討論。
description.en: Service management is to discuss How to manage service and satisfy customers. The content of the course: Service concept 、The service delivery system 、Service facility and layout、Productivity and quality improvement、Forecasting、Service quality、Service strategy、Customer satisfaction、Case study.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。二技三年級實施普通班體育正課教學。
description.en: The teaching goal is to establishing students have a Health life、Sportsmanship、Team work and Life time exercise habit.  All Freshman students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.

description.zh: 提供本校四技學生在本行以外，對其他領域的認識，以彌補其只鑽研專業課程的偏頗，訓練學生整合知識，使不致在知識爆炸的時代中迷失，促進各種專材的溝通，培養共識；培育人文素養，啟發人文關懷，使具有完整的人生觀。
description.en: This course offers a good opportunity for four-year college students in this university to have an easier access to a completely different field of knowledge, in the hope that  students can add their individual professional knowledge and broaden their minds. The students will be furnished with integrated knowledge, discovering a better way towards professional communication, developing more common sense and never losing themselves in this information-explosive age. With a solid basis on humanity and liberal ideology, they are sure to find a more complete picture of human life.

description.zh: 本課程的重點在於闡述應用統計學之基本概念，主要的內容涵蓋三個領域：敘述統計、機率理論與推論統計，其中包含資料蒐集與描述、機率論、抽樣方法與抽樣分配、假設檢定、變異數分析、迴歸與相關分析。
description.en: The purpose of Statistics and its application is to give an introduction of descriptive statistics, probability, and inductive statistics. They include data collection and description, probability, sampling methods and sampling distribution, hypothesis testing, ANOVA, regression and correlation analysis.

description.zh: 本課程以提供二技及四技學生標準訂定有關各類問題解答方法。本課程之目的在尋求以數量模式求出相關作業問題之最佳解，並介紹學生瞭解作業研究的本質，數量規畫方法及機率型態問題等。本課程包括下列主題：線型規畫、網路分析、動態規畫、遊戲理論、整數規畫、非線型規畫、馬可夫鏈、等候線理論、存貨理論、預測、馬可夫決策過程、可靠度、決策分析及系統模擬等。
description.en: The course makes college student to have the ability of soving related problems.The purpose of this course is using quantity model to find the optimal solution of related operation problems and introduce the entity of operation research to student. This course includes following topics:linear programming , network analysis , dynamic programming, game theory, integer theory,non-linear programming , markevo chain,,wait-linear theory, inventory theory programming, markevo decision process , reliabity,decision analysis and system simulation and so on.

description.zh: 本課程在於使同學瞭解管理思想的演進，與管理有關之重要理論，以及未來管理之發展趨勢。課程主要內容包括：組織與管理、管理哲學、管理思想的演進、管理功能（規畫、領導、組織、控制、評估）、溝通、組織成長與改變、未來之管理、個案研討。
description.en: The course is to make the students realize :1. The progress of management,2. The theories of management,  3. The future of management.The topics of this course:1. Organization and management.2. Philosophies of management.3. The function of management.4. Communication.5. The future of management.6. Case studies.

description.zh: 本課程在使學生瞭解與企業（工業）相關之法律，以為未來就業時能具備基本之法律基礎。課程大綱如下：商事法之特質、民法概述、商業登記法、公司法、票據法、保險法。
description.en: This course is set to make the students understand the concepts of laws dealing with related industrial and business, and being the base of working in the futures. It includes: 1. The characters of business laws. 2. The presentment of civil code. 3. The business registration laws and business laws. 4. The insurance laws.

description.zh: 物流管理： 本課程在使學生瞭解生產的物品或提供的服務能適時適地，並以最少的成本送到顧客手中。 本課程之內容如下： 1.物流管理和策略 2.運輸和配送 3.保管與包裝 4.定單處理 5.採購 6.物料搬運 7.物流成本 8.物流服務 9.資訊系統 10.物流生產力衡量 11.個案實務研討。
description.en: Logistics Management: The aim of the course is to help the students understand how to perform logistics activities so as to make products and services available to customers at the time place, and in the condition and from desired in the most profitable or cost-effective way. The content of the course description: 1. Logistics management & Strategy 2.Transpor totion 3.Inventory maintenance 4.Order processing 5.Purchasing 6.Warehousing & packaging 7.Materials handling 8.Logistics costs 9.Logistics customer service 10.Productivity measurement .11.Case study.

description.en: Introduction of Modern Control Theory﹒Linear space Analysis , State equation and Response, Controllability and Observability , Stability Analysis, State Feedback and Estimation, Controller Design and Applications, Observer Design and Applications, Nonlinear systems, Time varying Systems, Applications of Modern Control theory.﹒

description.en: Switched-capacitor circuits, Oscillators, Continuous-time filters, Phase-locked loop, Nonlinearity and mismatch, Short-channel effects and device models, Layout and packaging for analog IC.

description.en: Case Study, Mechatronics in Industry, Seminars.

description.zh: 機構與機械元件設計基礎，古典動力學基礎，近代機械加工，電機機械，電機驅動與設計，光電及感測基本原理，機電系統匹配，專題實作及實驗等機電相關課題
description.en: Mechanisms and machine elements, classical dynamics, modern machining methods, electric machines and drivers, sensors, special topics and labs of machatrocics system.

description.en: Introduction, Window operation System, API, DDL, Design of DDE and OLE, Structure of Client/Server System, Multimedia, Image Compression, Graphic supervisory/control system.

description.zh: 本課程分三單元，包括：(1) 應用量子力學：量子力學的基本結構，簡單量子系統，原子、分子及晶體之電子結構與能階，量子躍遷，量子統計，傳輸現象、量子雜訊，晶體能帶結構，量子光學，多體量子系統。(2)奈米材料學：奈米材料之基本性質，奈米材料特殊之物性，奈米材料擴散及燒結特性，特殊奈米材料、CNT製程與應用。(3)奈米顆粒材料：奈米顆粒材料特性，奈米顆粒材料之製程，奈米顆粒材料之檢測分析技術，奈米顆粒材料之光電應用，奈米顆粒材料之熱流應用，奈米顆粒材料之生化應用，奈米顆粒材料專題報告。
description.en: (1) Applied quantum mechanics: Basic approach, simple quantum systems, time dependent quantum phenomena, statistical physics, transport phenomena, quantum  optics,  many-body effects.(2) Nano materials: Fundamental properties of material special physical properties diffusion and sintering characteristics, carbon nano tube related fabrication process and application.(3) Nanoparticles Technology: Property of nano particles fabrication, measuring analysis, some applications related with optoelectronics fluid, thermal, and biochemistry project.

description.zh: (1)簡述行動無線通訊，(2)無線網際網路與WLAN，(3)行動隨意式網路（MANET），(4)MANET：MAC層協約，(5)MANET：多重路由協約，(6)MANET：服務品質，(7)MANET：安全協約，(8)MANET：電能管哩，(9)無線感測網路，(10)混合式無線網路，(11)近期發展與研究議題。

description.en: 1.Ideal Transmission line Fundamentals2.Crosstalk3.Nonideal Interconnect Issues4.Connectors, Packages, and Vias5.Nonideal Return Paths, Simultaneous Switching Noise and Power Delivery6.Electronic Circuits Simulations

name.en: Verification on Electromagnetic Compatibility of RFID

description.zh: 課程之目的在於讓學生能夠學習到RFID之電磁相容規範與驗測技術，以培養學生具備RFID EMC實務與驗測之能力。本課程之大綱如下所示：1.電磁相容與RFID簡介2.電磁相容規範3.訊號、雜訊與頻譜4.輻射性電磁干擾5.傳導性放射干擾6.串音干擾7.屏蔽效應8.RFID EMC驗測方法
description.en: The goal of this course for students is to learn the theorem and specification of Electromagnetic Compatibility (EMC) with the verification techniques of RFID. The outlines of the course are: 1.Introduction of EMC and RFID2.Specification of EMC3.Signal, noise and spectrum4.Interference of EM emission5.Interference of conducted emission6.Interference of cross-talk7.Shielding effectiveness8.Verification techniques on EMC of RFID

name.zh: 混合訊號積體電路設計

description.zh: 本課程在研習混合訊號積體電路設計，其課程目的在給予學習者了解目前混合訊號CMOS積體電路分析與設計，並強調基礎與應用知識以符合工業界的需求，課程內容可包括下列主題。1.混合訊號設計概述 2.連續時間濾波器 3.交換電容濾波器 4.交換電流濾波器 5.數位類比轉換器 6.類比數位轉換器 7.超取樣積分三角類比數位轉換器 8.管線式類比數位轉換器 9.混合訊號積體電路佈局
description.en: This course is concerned with the mixed-signal integrated circuit design. Its purpose is to deal with the analysis and design of mixed-signal CMOS integrated circuits, emphasizing fundamentals as well as new paradigms that students need to master in today's industry. The course covers the following topics. 1.Introduction to mixed-signal design 2.Continuous-time filters 3.Switched-capacitor filters 4.witched-current filters 5.D/A converters 6.A/D conerters 7.Oversampled Sigma-Delta A/D coverters 8.Pipelined A/D converter 9.Layout for mixed-signal integrated circuit

name.en: Special Topics on Urban Disaster Prevention

description.zh: 介紹國內外"都市防災基本計畫"之沿革，內容；探討都市防災之規劃，設計；都市更新（災後重建）中防災的課題；防災生活圈與防災據點之設立原則。
description.en: Introduce the "Urban precaution basis plan"of Taiwan and other countries; Study the subjects regarding to city renewing or reduiding after the caution;discuss the principles to set up the living zones and preecaution bases for urban disaster prevention.

name.en: Special Topics on Fire Protection Management

description.zh: 本課程主要教授防火管理基本架構，包含燃燒理論，火災特性，防火區劃，防火生活圈，防火計劃與防火管理組織等，並藉由制度化之管理手段技巧教授學生了解防火管理之目的與方法。
description.en: The course is dive lessons on basic concept of fire protection , such as characteristics of fire , district of fire protection , plan and management of fire etc.

name.en: Special Topics of Disaster Prevention and Civil Engineering

description.zh: 本課程之內容主要訓練學生獨立思考，培養學生對土木防災之認識，進而學習土木工程在防災上的應用，並進行專題報告、專題演講及研究小組討論。
description.en: This course is trying to train independent thinking, to cultivate understanding precaution of civil engineering for students. This course is also learning the application of precaution of civil engineering. In the class we have case study, seminar, and group meeting.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論Case Study, Seminar
description.en: Case Study, Seminar

description.zh: 本課程以汽車產業為例，說明車輛製造課程包含車輛製造現場管理和車輛製造技術流程兩大部分，使學生了解整個汽車製造產業上的設備管理、量產管理和品質管理，以及汽車製造上所需的各種工藝技術，以觸發學生對汽車製造領域的興趣，進而擴大未來在汽車產業的服務機會。
description.en: This course takes the vehicle industry as an example to introduce the spot management and technical operation of vehicle manufacture. Students will understand the fields in facilities management, output management and quality control from this course. Furthermore, the aim of this course is to increase the students' interest and opportunity in the region of vehicle manufacture.

description.zh: 本課程之目標為增進研究生之英文閱讀能力與寫作技巧。介紹英文科技論文的慣用語法、用字與閱讀技巧，並分析撰寫英文報告與學術論文之章法與組織要領。
description.en: Objective of this course is to improve reading ability and writing skill for graduate students.  This course introduces grammar, terms and phrases that are frequently used in English technical articles.  Structures of English essay and thesis will also be explained.

description.zh: 本課程將介紹流體機械設計上之相關理論與其流場行為的分析方法，內容包括流體機械的熱流動力學、翼列間流場理論、軸流式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機)設計與分析、離心式渦輪機械(幫浦、風扇、壓縮機) 設計與分析、渦卷式和螺旋式壓縮機設計與分析、電腦輔助流體機械設計。
description.en: This course intends to introduction the design principles of turbomachinery and the methods to analyze the flow behavior. The course contents are: thermo-fluid dynamics aspects of turbomachinery, cascade flow, preliminary design and analysis of xial-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fan), centrifugal-flow turbomachines (pump, compressors and fans), scroll and screw compressor, the computational aided design of turbomechinery.

description.zh: 本課程主要目標為將數學方法應用在工程問題，課程內容有常微分方程，線性代數，向量微積分，及偏微分方程式等之簡介，訓練同學數學應用於工程計算及研究。內容包括數值方法，機率理論及數學機率等。
description.en: The main target of this course is to intoduce mathematical methods ot engineering applications; the course will cover areas in differential equations and vecto calculus. This course will also train students in applying mathematics to engineering calculations and research, such as unmerical methods and statistical methods.

description.zh: 本課程主要針對環境工程的領域有關冷凍空調部份作更深入的解說，主要闡述︰1. 室內空調房間微污染控制︰粉塵、氣膠、氣態污染物等。2. 冷媒污染問題︰ＣＦＣ、新冷媒的現狀及展望、溫室效應等。3. 產業空調用有害物質排放及處理技術。4. 產業空調用超純水製造及水之再利用、節水技術。
description.en: This course is concentrated in the area of environment issues which relates to Air Conditioning and Refrigeration. The course therefore encompasses a number of subjects:1.Indoor Air Quality Control: particles, aerosols, temperature, relative humidity etc.  2.CFC issues: the problems of CFC, the current status and future prospect of new refrigerants, green effect etc3.The disposal and treatment of waste materials for industrial HVAC & R applications. 4.The water issues of high-tech industry: ultra-pure water production, water-saving technology, waste water reuse technology etc.

description.zh: 控制理論基礎，冷凍控制系統方式簡介，冷凍系統控制元件認識，冷凍循環運轉控制系統規劃，冷凍應用環境溫溼度及污染控制，除霜、防溼及防凍控制設計，冷凍應用節能控制系統規劃設計
description.en: Fundamentals of control logic, introduction to refrigerating control methods, controlled devices and controllers, control circuit design for refrigerating cycle operating, schematic design of space temperature, humidity and contaminants control, Defrost, frost and moisture control design, energy saving control system design

description.zh: 介紹空調系統節能的理論與實用技術。內容包括：空調元件能源秏損分析，系統搭配之操作性能及總體熱效率評估，耗能因素改善方法與技術，節能設備之原理與設計技術。
description.en: The course is prepared for the theory and technology of ventilation energy conservation. The topics are: energy loss analysis of system components, survey of system cop and overall efficiency, improving methods and technology, and the fundamentals and design technology of energy conservation devices.

description.zh: 課程內容包含：系統定義、資料分析、迴歸方法、系統元件數值模建立、數值計算方法、系統性能模擬及數值佳化方法。
description.en: The course materials are as follows: definition of system, analysis of data, regression method, modeling equipment, numerical calculation, simulation and optimization of system

description.zh: 中文概述：專題報告、專題演講、研究小組討論。
description.en: Case study. Seminar. Group meeting.

description.zh: 本課程為訓練學生具有敏銳的觀察能力及細密的思考能力，以發現技職教育的相關問題，並擬定完善可行的研究計畫，遂行研究工作，經客觀分析程序，並作成研究論。課程內容括技職教育研究概論、研究設計、研究方法、取樣與量測、資料處理、報告撰寫。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the technological education. It discusses how to design quantitative research, collect, and report the data. It also highlights the difference between quantitative research and qualitative research.

name.zh: 電腦在教育研究的應用

description.zh: 本課程訓練學生熟悉電腦系統並應用電腦套裝軟體，作為研究分析之基礎，以進行教育研究工作，包含SPSS、ERIC及其他相關軟體。
description.en: This course emphasis the applications of computer in the educational research.

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生熟悉統計方法與理論，使能利用已知的資料，經由整理、分析並作成合理解讀，作為教育相關研究工具。課程內容包括機率、抽樣分配與估計，假設考驗，相關迥歸分析、變異數分析等。
description.en: This course is designed to equip students with ability to analyze and interpret experiments and surveys. Course contains include probability concept, sampling distribution, interval estimation, hypothesis testing and analysis of variance.

name.en: Field Test Environment Management and Safety

description.zh: 探討技職學校實習工場規劃、布置、管理場房、設備物料及工場人事等管理事項，以及實習工場安全防護設施與措施，以達到教學研究及安全法規之需求。
description.en: Exploring the best practice of management and safety for field test environment is the purpose of this course.

name.en: Guidance for Vocational and Technical Schools’ Students

description.zh: 本課程旨在探討當代輔導理論、技職教育學生特質，以及各種重要之學生問題如生涯規劃、職業輔導等輔導的原理與方法。
description.en: The course is designed to explore the theories and practice of Counseling for vocational and technical school students. The contents conclude the principles of counseling, characters of students, and the various techniques of counseling.

description.zh: 本課程在探討技職教育行政理論包括組織、領導、決策、溝通、效能研究等及其相關實務之研究。期培育學生分析當前技職教育行政問題，並研訂技職教育的改善措施。
description.en: The aims of the course are to explore the theory and practice of educational administration, especially the educational organization, leadership, decision making, communication, etc. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.en: Administration of Vocational and Technological School

description.zh: 本課程在探討學校行政理論的歷史背景、學校社會系統理論、學校科層體制、學校氣氛、學校領導、決策、溝通理論、學校效能等，並以技職學校作為討論主軸。
description.en: This course is to guide students to explore the historical background of the theories of school administration; theories of school social system; school departmental hierarchy; school atmosphere; school leadership; theories of decision and communication; studies of school efficiency. Students are expected to apply related theory to analyze VTE issues after the class.

name.zh: 學校人力資源發展與管理
name.en: Human Resource Development and Management in Schools

description.zh: （一）瞭解學校人力資源發展與管理之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行學校人力資源發展與管理之基本能力。課程內容包括：學校人力資源發展與管理之定義與內涵、人力資源管理與學校效能、學校人力資源發展之需求評估與規劃、教職員工甄選、教職員工的工作動機、教職員工專業發展、教職員工的績效評量、薪資與獎勵及創造高生產力的工作環境等。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development and management in schools, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of developing human resource development and management in schools. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development and management in schools, human resource management and effective schools, assessing and planning of human resource development in schools, selecting staffs, motivation of personnel, professional development for educational personnel, evaluating employee performance, compensation and rewards, and creating productive work environments.

description.zh: 探討網路教學與學習之相關原理，以及實務應用。內容包括有網路學習之優點、特性、限制、科技、媒體、平台、教材、教師角色與管理、學生角色與任務、實際案例、未來趨勢等。
description.en: To explore theories and practical application Web-based instruction and learning including WBL advantages, characteristics, limitations, technology, media, platforms, materials, teacher roles and management, student roles and tasks, practical cases, and future trends etc..

name.en: Theory and practice of Technical-Vocational Education

description.zh: 課程內容包括：技職教育的理論基礎、能力本位、建教合作、生計教育、職業輔導、技職課程與教學等理念與實務。
description.en: Course content include: theoretical foundations and developmental trends of technical and vocational education, competence-based instruction, cooperative education, career education, vocational guidance, technical and vocational education curriculum.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

description.zh: 研究生依據個人基礎:透過個別化指導，就其興趣對教育哲學領域，進行小型研究問題的探討與實作以發展研究能力。
description.en: Exploration of theories, trends and research in educational philosophy. An individualized study program is planned to develop the skills and research for graduate students and guided by a professor.

description.zh: 研究生提出產學合作領域有關的個人構想計劃書，經由個別化指導，可以深入探討新的發現並提出研究心得報告。
description.en: An individualized study is planned for graduate students and guided by a professor. The students have to offer the proposal of specific topical interests and conceptual frameworks in enterprise cooperative program. Analysis of current issues and conclusion or implications underlying major research in enterprise cooperative program through independent, directed study.

description.zh: 本課程將透過每週專題演講方式，讓學生了解有機材料之最新開發成品或最先進之研究成果。演講者之安排將以校外知名專家學者及校內各計畫執行者為主。
description.en: This course will provide important information regarding to the latest development or application on the organic materials. Speakers being invited are well-known scholars in organic area.  Graduate students or thesis advisors will also be invited to report any in interesting result from their graduate studies.

description.zh: 本課程是針對已修習一年的大學有機化學的同學，因此課程規劃成反應、機構與結構式等三個主要部分。修畢本課程的同學應已具有瞭解有機化學相關論文與研究成果的能力。
description.en: This course is designed for students who have taken one-year undergraduate organic chemistry course. It is divided into the three fundamental aspects of the study of organic chemistry:reactions, mechanisms and structure. A student who has completed this course should be able to approach the literature directry, with a sound knowledge of modern basic organic chemistry.

description.zh: 本課程主要探討高分子在溶液及固態時的物理化學現象及其應用。內容包括�溶液熱力學?高分子的微結構及定性。�溶液熱力學探討統計熱力學、晶格理論、Flory-Huggin理論、Flory-Krigbaum理論、相分離、θ-溫度、滲透壓、GPC測分子量、高分子膠體。?高分子之微結構包括有高分子之形狀、自由旋轉分子鏈距離、光散射、中子散射、排拒體積、碎形、霍氏光譜及核磁共振儀在高分子微結構之分析。
description.en: The course is to investigate the physical phenomena of macromolecules in the solution and solid state. It includes the solution thermodynamics and chemical microstructure of polymer chains.The solution thermodynamics is to study lattice theory, statistical thermodynamics, Flory-Huggin theory, Flory-Krigbaum theory, phase separation, θ-temperature, Osmometry, GPC, and polymer gels.Light scattering and Neutron scattering are used to characterize the polymer microstructure. Polymer radius of gyration, freely rotating chains, excluded volume, fractal, and scaling are also discussed. Finally, spectroscopy methods are used to study polymerization models and microstructure.

name.en: Analysis and Identification of Organic Materials

description.zh: 本課程包含材料的結構鑑定和材料的性質分析。材料的結構鑑定方法有：元素分析、吸收光譜法、振動光譜法、核磁共振光譜法、質譜法、x-射線光譜法和電子顯微鏡法。材料的性質分析包含：材料熱性質(DSC, TGA, TMA,DMA)和材料機械性質(伸張、壓縮、剪力強度等)。
description.en: The materials of the course include structure identification and property analysis of materials. Methods of structure identification  of materials are : elemental analysis, absorption spectroscopy, vibration spectroscopy, nuclear magnetic resonance spectroscopy, mass spectrometry, x-ray spectroscopy and electron microscopy. Metheds of property analysis of materials are : thermal properties of materials (DSC,TGA,TMA,DMA) and mechanical properties of materials (tensile, compression and shear strengths).

description.zh: 高分子流變學本課程以講述高分子流體之黏性及彈性為主。內容包括:(1) 黏彈性簡介(2)時間溫度轉換(3)非結晶區之玻璃轉移點(4)橡膠理論(5)黏彈模型(6)介電鬆弛等專題。
description.en: This course will extensively study the viscosity and elasticity of polymeric materials. The main contents include(1) Phenomenalogical Treatment of Viscoelasticity(2) Time-Temperature Correspondence(3) Transitions and Relaxation in Amorphous Polymers(4) Rubber Elasticity(5) Viscoelastic Models(6) Dielectric Relaxation

description.zh: 本課程探討液晶之形成原理及其在高科技之應用，其內容包括從液晶之熱力學探討液晶形成之原理，低分子量液晶在顯示器(STN LCD, TFT LCD)之應用，液晶配向膜，液晶補償膜，彩色濾光片之原理及應用，鐵電式液晶在光電之用途。最後研究主鏈和側鏈型的液晶高分子，如層列型、膽固醇型，這些材料在高科技及非線性光學上之發展。
description.en: The course is to elucidate the physics and chemistry of liquid crystal material. It includes application of liquid crystal as display derivces, liquid crystal display compensator, color filter, STN LCD, TFT LCD, and ferroelectric liquid crystals. Finally the potential application of the liquid crystal in nonlinear optics and high-tech industries will be discussed.

description.zh: 研究生相較於大學期間訓練的最主要差別在於其必須從事個人的學術研究。因此，研究生須要資訊與洞察力以達成獲得較高學位之論文寫作能力。故本課程主要內容包括：  一、 研究的特性  二、 智慧收集-「什麼」的問題  三、 研究-「何故」的問題  四、 良好研究的特質  五、 研究的基本類型  六、 從事研究的技能  七、 研究倫理  八、 研究設計練習
description.en: The necessity for personal academic research is the key cultural change that postgraduate students will encounter compared with their undergraduate days. Thus, postgraduate students need information and insights to develop the capacity to operate successfully achieving a higher-level degree. To examine these concerns, the course includes:1. Characteristics of research2. Intelligence-gathering-the "what" questions3. Research-the "why" questions4. Characteristics of good research5. Basic types of research6. The craft of doing research7. Research ethics8. Research design practice

description.zh: 空間結構為一意義之表層結構（表達形式），深層結構為意義表達形式建構之運算規則，自素材中系統地抽取深義部份，統合成一意義深層結構：誘導式結構。此深層結構為一內化於主體之新經驗即情境，為利自身回饋與外在檢驗，深層結構不能外於主、客之交互文字論述建構。邏輯為回饋與外驗二者之有效推理與洞察之建構與檢驗工具，效力建立於置信概率上，因此誘導式結構之建構亦不能脫離於時空之相對合理外。
description.en: Space Structure is the Surface Structure of a represented meaning while H.S.is the Deep Structure and the Constructing Operator of the represented meaning. The Deep Structure was the unity of the significance abstracted from the materials systematically. The Deep Structure as an interiorized experience also called Situation, should not be seperated from the correlative construction of language expond, which will provide the opportunities for the outside inspection and the introspection. Logic is the fundation of the construction and the two-way inspections of the valid reasoning and insight. The validity is based on the credal probability, hence, the H.S.will be restricted in the boundary of Relative Time and Space.Situation as the operator of intuition, will combine the physical materials as a representational formation.

description.zh: 本課程主要以歷史脈絡與觀點，鼓勵學生瞭解時空推移與聚落發展及計畫需求的差異，以加強其專業潛力及強化其能力以服務人群。課程內容主要包括：    一、 都市化的萌芽    二、 古典都市    三、 中世紀城鎮    四、 新古典城市    五、 工業革命    六、 都市對比    七、 生活條件提昇    八、 尋求好的都市    九、 重建都市與現代社會趨勢
description.en: The aim of this course is to encourage students to fulfill their professional potentials and expand their ability to serve the public by a historical context and perspectives. Its content including:  1. The dawn of urbanization  2. The classic city  3. The medieval city  4. The neoclassic city  5. The industrial revolution  6. The city of contrasts  7. Betterment of living conditions  8. Environmental improvement  9. Search for the good city  10. Rebuilding our city and modern social trends

description.zh: 本課程主要探討台灣現行依據都市更新條例進行之都市更新實務之相關議題，透過理論與實務操作研討熟悉台灣都市更新操作機制及趨勢。主要內容包括如下：都市生命力再開發之契機與課題、都市再開發之目標、策略公部門執行都市更新之手段策略與課題民間團體執行都市更新之手段策略與課題現行都市更新手段之探討中國都市更新執行機制與成效都市更新規劃實務-都市更新概要計畫都市更新規劃實務-都市更新事業計畫都市更新規劃實務-容積獎勵之爭取（公共公益設施）日本推動都市再開發之相關配套措施（金融融資政策之探討）民間團體主辦都市更新與權利變換概說、不動產證卷化與信託
description.en: This course regards relative issues of urban revitalization implementation according to the Urban Renewal Act in Taiwan. This course consisted of several parts as below: Introduction of Urban Renewal Act the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of government the issues & strategies of Urban Renewal of private sector the methods & strategies of urban renewalthe effects & authority of urban renewal in Mainland China the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal brief the implementation of urban renewal-urban renewal planthe implementation of urban renewal-Floor Area Bonusthe implementation of urban renewal-Rights Concession plan he implementation of urban renewal-Investment Trust、Trust Funds

description.en: Case Study, Seminar, Group Meeting.

name.zh: 高等電腦輔助工程分析

description.zh: 讓學生了解並熟悉工程軟體於工程問題分析之應用，培養解決實務及研發問題的能力。課程概述：在具備固體、熱流等力學及有限元素分析理論的基礎上，利用3D繪圖與高階有限元素分析整合軟體，將工程實務問題作實體建模，並進行物理行為模擬分析與理論驗證，包括靜態、動態、落下測試、穩定性、疲勞、熱傳、非線性、多重物理參數耦合及最佳化等問題之實例演練。最後以實際研發專題作為本課程學習之體驗。
description.en: On the basis of applied mechanics such as the solid, thermal fluid and finite element analysis theory, utilize the computer engineering software, which the 3D computer aided drawing is integrated with finite element analysis, to simulate the practical engineering problem. The physical behaviors such as static, dynamic, dropping testing, stability, fatigue, heat transfer, nonlinearity, coupled multi-physics and optimization, etc. can be verified and predicted through the simulating analysis for several practical model. The course will give both comprehensive experience and knowledge of a special researching topic finally.

description.zh: 本課程旨在教導學生一個簡潔、廣泛又清楚的工業設計研究方法的知識及技能架構，課程包括二大部份；第一部份探討工業設計研究計畫的準備及撰擬，第二部份除比較分析主要的工業設計研究方法外，也同時探討其中一種研究方法在工業設計專業領域的應用實例。
description.en: This course is a survey of research methodology that is relevant to the Industrial Design field. It focuses on conducting an industrial design research, collect, and report the data. This course also highlights the difference among that mainstream research methodology in Industrial Design field.

description.zh: 設計相關專題，以文獻研讀，邀請專家專題演講，及論文討論為重點，參與者透過密集討論、書面報告、或舉行口頭發表等方式，可以有效率地交換意見，獲得更深入而廣泛的認識。
description.en: Topical studies in history, theory, and criticism of design. Under the above goals, inviting addresses for special topics will be arranged though the courses. The Participants are encouraged to have intensive discussion, written reports, or further oral presentation. Efficient opinion exchange would be also expected to derive more extensive interest.

description.zh: 本課程旨在介紹研究電腦輔助設計軟硬體，並藉設計實例演練，以熟悉研究電腦輔助設計軟應體之操作與功能。
description.en: To introduce and study the software of computer-aided-design. By the design project practice, to be adept at the operation and function of computer-aided-design software.

description.zh: 設計與生活是自古以來就相生相隨的一項行為，生活型態的變化，對生活器具的要求也就不同。故本課程主要在探討研究設計行為與生活型態之關係，進而提供新思維作為設計行為之參考。
description.en: Design is a part of human life. Demands in design changes withlifestyle. This course focuses on general review of ifestyle research that is practically constructive in the process of product planning and design.。

description.zh: 永續發展是妥善規劃與管理自然資源之最高指導原則，因此本課程﹙一﹚依此宗旨討論水資源保育、固廢管理與空氣污染控制；更將以實際例將面向擴及科技與社經整合層次，以期落實理論於實際應用之中。
description.en: This is intented as a brief introduction to the subject of the substainable development of natural resource. Main subject are water conservation, solid waste management and air pollution control. Many overall regional case studies will be discussed. It must be technologic, economic and social environmental change or a new factural data are developed

name.en: Treatment and Management for Hazardous Materials

description.zh: 以技術觀點，配合環境法令之管理架構，本課程主要講授有害物質的毒性、危害性及對環境污染的影響。此包括前處理、中間處理技術、最終處置及其相對應的管理方法。
description.en: On the point of view on technology and regulatory limits, the course presents the treatment and management for hazardous materials. It includes toxicity, pretreatment, middle treatment and final disposal. Management relative to hazardous wastes will also delineated.

description.zh: 專題報告，專題演講，研究小組討論。
description.en: Seminar  report ， seminar  speech ， seminar  discussion。
